item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog v4.0.0 (2024/11/27) Fixed Terms cloud overflow bug (#57) Mathjax white pixels on top and bottom left of page (#56) Change resource fingerprint from sha512 to sha256 to prevent file name too long issue during build Changed BREAKING CHANGE The minimum hugo version requirement is now 0.128.0. Adjust your config’s paginate to pagination.pagerSize accordingly (#58, #59, #60) New Add Russian translation (#52) Add French (France) translation (#54) v3.1.0 (2024/05/26) Fixed Remove line number of code block from the site search data New Support anchor link next to header elements (#18) v3.

item.title: Setup
item.description: This document shows a brief guide to setup hugo-theme-monochrome in your hugo project. Quick Start Install Hugo You need “extended” version of hugo to support SASS. Checkout Install Hugo for more details. Take Linux for example: snap install hugo --channel=extended The minimum hugo version that hugo-theme-monochrome required is 0.128.0 Create a New Site hugo new site <project name> Add a Theme cd <project name> git init git submodule add https://github.com/kaiiiz/hugo-theme-monochrome.git themes/hugo-theme-monochrome Then add theme = "hugo-theme-monochrome" to your config.
